p: Between the December 31, 2019 and the beginning of February 2020, a novel coronavirus SARSCoV-2 spreads from China all over the world. SARS-CoV-2 induced a disease called COVID-19 by the World Health Organization (WHO) which declared the pandemic status ( https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/events-as-they-happen).
